summary.name: Hotel Accursio
summary.tagline: Shopping hotel with 1 bars, connected to the convention center, near Palazzolo-Don Gnocchi Institute

items.text: Continental breakfast (surcharge) each morning 7:00 AMâ€“10:00 AM

editorial.title: Milan
content: Located in Cagnola neighborhood, Hotel Accursio is connected to a shopping center. Cathedral of Milan and Teatro alla Scala are notable landmarks, and travelers looking to shop may want to visit Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's happening at San Siro Stadium or Autodromo Nazionale Monza.
